entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 8:43 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.7°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: E 35 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High zero.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:59 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
